alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gibson; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Henderson, southeastern Gibson, Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Blue Goose, or 10 miles southeast of Milan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, McKenzie, Huntingdon, Fairview, Three Way, Atwood, Blue Goose, Bargerton, Parkers Crossroads, Carroll, Medina, Trezevant, Clarksburg, McLemoresville, Howley, Hickory Flat, Hillard, Dollar, Cedar Grove and Union Cross. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
